did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Methodist Protestant Church of Greece record book, 1841-1881.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Methodist Protestant Church of Greece (Greece, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One volume containing original members' names and a list of persons added subsequently; a membership list for Class No. 2 (organized at North Greece); quarterly conference meeting minutes; baptisms; marriages; and a list of collections.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One volume containing original members' names and a list of persons added subsequently (1841-1843); a membership list for Class No. 2 (organized at North Greece); quarterly conference meeting minutes (1841-1881); baptisms (1843, 1848); marriages (1842); and a list of collections (1843-1844)

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Methodist Protestant Church of Greece (Greece, N.Y.)

controlaccess.head: Places:
controlaccess.geogname: Monroe County (N.Y.) -- Religious life and customs.

prefercite.p: Methodist Protestant Church of Greece record book, #6210. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
